item.title: Trauma-focused therapy shows promise for children struggling with PTSD
item.description: A specialist form of therapy could offer hope for some of the most vulnerable young PTSD sufferers, according to a University of East Anglia study.

item.title: Gestational diabetes linked to cognitive decline in mothers, increased risk of neurodevelopmental disorders in children

item.title: Overweight and obesity don't always increase the risk of an early death, Danish study finds

item.title: Cannabis use associated with quadrupled risk of developing type 2 diabetes, finds study of over 4 million adults
